periods.name: New Year's Day
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 39, with temperatures falling to around 37 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 5 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 28. West wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain And Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow after noon. Mostly cloudy. High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 0 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow then Mostly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 26. West southwest wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 34. Northwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 19. North northwest wind around 6 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 32. North wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. East northeast wind 2 to 7 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Snow likely and sleet likely and freezing rain likely before noon, then sleet and freezing rain and rain and snow. Cloudy, with a high near 33. East wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Sleet likely and freezing rain likely and rain and snow likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. Northeast wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 30. North northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 13. Northwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 26. Northwest wind around 9 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 10. Northwest wind around 6 mph.
